member.param: The identifier of the model to invoke (e.g., anthropic.claude-3-sonnet-20240229-v1:0)
The prompt to send to the model
Additional parameters for model invocation (temperature, max_tokens, etc.)
member.returns: Model invocation response containing the generated content and metadata
